QuestData.Title: In Pursuit of Shades
QuestData.Description: You say it spoke of a master? Of one who holds Zin-Malor?$B$BThis is grave news. You must act, $c! I saw the shade fly off to the south. Take the path to the upper ruins, and you may be able to climb the frozen waterfall after it!$B$BAnd do not let your guard down... it may be waiting for you.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: We must discover who commands this monstrosity!
QuestData.LogDescription: Pursue and slay the Shade of the Spiritspeaker and obtain any evidence of its master.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find the shade? Was anything left to indicate its origin?
QuestData.RewardText: Let me see... faintly written, among the engraved incantations, is the name of its master!$B$B"Umbranse..."
